title: Level 3 Honor Flair
body: so i recently gotten level 3 honor and i had a flair for a few games then it dissapeared is that suppose to happen?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Promiscuous,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=AmEvYWet,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-07-31T06:43:43.868+0000)
>
> so i recently gotten level 3 honor and i had a flair for a few games then it dissapeared is that suppose to happen?

"At level 3 and above, honors from two premade teammates unlock loading screen flair in your next game."

"At level 3 and above, an honor from a non-premade teammate unlocks loading screen flair in your next game."

Source: http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/honor

Hope it helps

Ah thanks was confused about this as well 
(>'_')>

Thanks for the assistance F8 ^_^!

Once you're at Honor 3, you need to get honored by 2 premade teammates or 1 random teammate to have a the flair show up on the next loading screen. They only last for one match, so you need to consistently be honored to keep it.
